(Halem - M.oil 5.63 lt. Salt 5.63 qt has been distributed on 10.07.2024 night and is included on 11.07.2024 s report.)
(Sonari - House Damage Assessment is under process . Numbers of damaged houses can be mentioned after assesment. )

(Dalgaon - Report submitted as per the report received from LM and GP), (Pub-Mangaldai - As report received from EE PHE various
PWSS Scheme were partially damaged due to flooding at No2 Magurmari, No2 Magurmari, No1 Garapari, Garapari Nispi, Dhansirikash
Chapari , No1 Gadhowa Chapari , Baghpori Chapari under Pub Mangaldai Rev Circle. During Flood wave II.), (Sipajhar - Report
submitted based on the preliminary reports received from the concerned Lot Mandals, Gaonpradhans and the Officials of concerned
line departments.)
(Golakganj - The villages mentioned above are partially submerged(only paddy field) due to heavy rainfall . )

(Lakhipur - Bleaching Powder, Helogen Tablet and Mineral Water has been distributed and Temporary Toilet 387 Nos and Temporary
Urinal 273 Nos has been provided in the Char areas i.e flood affected areas by PHE Department, Goalpara Division, Goalpara.), (Matia -
Halogen Tablet Drinking Water and Bleaching Powder have been distributed by PHE Department Goalpara Division.)

(Jorhat East - As per information received from PHED, Jorhat total 4 Spot source disinfected under Jorhat East Revenue Circle. Dated-
11/07/2024)
(Palashbari - Reports are prepared on the basis of Gaonpradhan, LRA and Concerned departmental officials)

(Mayong - House Damage survey is going on and due to flood some areas are yet to be surveyed once the water recedes.), (Laharighat
- PHE department distributed a total of 15000 nos leaflet and 10000 nos chemical packet from 06-07-2024 to 11-07-2024.)
